ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Playing a rogue
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I ve been playing my rogue consistently now since last Thursday.  I ve gone up 4 levels.  I m almost to level 37 now.  Still in Dawnshroud Peaks.  But I
ygData.messageBody:
Well I've been playing my rogue consistently now since last Thursday.  I've gone up 4 levels.  I'm almost to level 37 now.  Still in Dawnshroud Peaks.  But I guess I'm getting too impatient.  XP isn't coming nearly as fast as I'd like.  I can pretty much solo lightcrawlers and some shrooms now. The tribals I can take if I have buffs, but that's about it.  I'm getting really tired of Dawnshroud.  Anybody have any suggestions on where I can go next that the xp might come a little faster?  I was told Dreadlands, but I should wait until I'm about level 38.  A place with some nice plat would be good too as I need to start upgrading my weapons and armor.  I need a better bow and some + stamina gear.  Any suggestions on what gear I could get or where I could hunt?
 
Wulfric Rennison
36 Half Elf Rogue
Cazic Thule server
